page.title: 15Linwood Shopping Centre
page.content: Linwood has a wide variety of shops, though many are now lying empty. Several shop units have never been leased and others such as{Woolworth and{Spar}have given up their leases. The{shopping centre}is located at the centre of the old village but now lies on the outskirts of the new town due to the growth of new housing. Most of the shopping facilities required are available in the centre and many of the shops provide{work experience for pupils from both the local Secondary schools. Due to the high level of unemployment in Linwood since the closure of the car factory, a{Job {Centre}has been opened in the town. Other shops include{supermarkets, Post {Office, Newsagent, Banks, Chemists, {Electrical Shop, Bakery, Cafe, {Butchers, Hairdressers}and{Baby Shop.
